
## Generate CellID input paths

```{r}
arguments <- rcell2::cellArgs2(path = path, parameters = parameters)
arguments
```

### Correr CellID

```{r}
rcell2::cell2(arguments = arguments, 
              cell.command = "~/Software/cellID-linux/cell",
              dry = F, no_cores = 1, label_cells_in_bf = T, output_coords_to_tsv = T)
```

## New function

```{r}
masks_tsv_path <- c("~/Software/cellID-linux/test_data_tmp/Position01/out_all_masks.tsv")
flags_tsv_path <- c("~/Software/cellID-linux/test_data_tmp/Position01/out_bf_fl_mapping")

flags_from_m_option_tsv <- function(cell_data, flags_tsv_path){
  read_tsv(flags_tsv_path) %>% 
    select(fluor, flag)
  
  paths <- cell_data$images %>% 
    mutate(file = paste0(path, "/", image)) %>% 
}

maks_from_m_option_tsv <- function(masks_tsv_path, position, .parallel = F){
    masks_coords <- read_tsv(masks_tsv_path) %>% 
      mutate(id = paste(cellID, t.frame, flag, pixtype, sep = "_"))
    
    if(.parallel) {
      hues_df <- hues_from_xy(masks_coords, split_col="id")} else {
      hues_df <- hues_from_xy2(masks_coords, split_col="id")}
    
    hues_by_cell <- masks_coords %>% 
      select(cellID, t.frame, flag, pixtype, id) %>% unique() %>%  # in test: 3208 rows
      left_join(hues_df, by = "id") %>%                            # in test: 3208 rows too :)
      select(-id) %>% mutate(pos = position)
    
    return(hues_by_cell)
}

hues_by_cell_df <- maks_from_m_option_tsv(masks_tsv_path = masks_tsv_path, position = 1)
```
